definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs
The Secret of the Golden Flower, a classic of Chinese Taoism published in the late 17th century
pinyin: Tai4 yi3 Jin1 hua2 Zong1 zhi3

sentences.english: Commitment to animal welfare issues and to promoting IFAW's mission.
sentences.chinese: 理解动物福利理念，并愿意推动IFAW宗旨。

sentences.english: The tenet of superiority for broad hall is built and promoted the collectors.
sentences.chinese: 文博会馆的宗旨也是为广大收藏者而倡建的。

sentences.english: The service purpose of the company is the principle based on good faith and costumers' satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 公司的服务宗旨以诚信为本，以客户的满意为原则。

sentences.english: Companies adhere to the "customer first, seeking the amount of profit" for the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 公司坚持“顾客至上，以量求利”为宗旨。

sentences.english: The party was established to represent the interests of workers and trade unionists.
sentences.chinese: 工党的成立宗旨是代表工人阶级和行业工会的利益。

sentences.english: Learn from tradition calligraphy but not limited by it, this is the principles of Wang Delin's calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 师古不泥古，这是王德林研习书法的宗旨。

sentences.english: The purpose of Li Yu's writing was to raise a laugh and to eliminate worries.
sentences.chinese: 李渔的戏曲创作宗旨就是博人一笑，替人消愁。

sentences.english: This hero is upholds justly, subdues the unprincipled person is his only objective.
sentences.chinese: 这位英雄是主持正义的，制伏坏人是他的惟一宗旨。

sentences.english: However, its basic purpose was to Christianize China.
sentences.chinese: 但它的根本宗旨是欲使中国基督教化。

sentences.english: Quality and reliable service, abide by the contract is our company's goal.
sentences.chinese: 质量可靠，服务周到，信守合同是我公司的一贯宗旨。

sentences.english: Mr. Liu， will you please clearly define the purposes of your organization？
sentences.chinese: 林先生，请您明确描述您组织的宗旨好么？

sentences.english: And gas riches, honest service is our aim.
sentences.chinese: 和气生财，诚信服务，是我们的宗旨。

sentences.english: Tai Xin company's motto is "Quality comes first, Service with sincerity".
sentences.chinese: 泰鑫公司一贯以“质量第一，真诚服务”为宗旨。

sentences.english: In chess, the idea is to unzip your opponent.
sentences.chinese: 下棋的宗旨就是击败对手。

sentences.english: Quality first is the service tenet of our store.
sentences.chinese: 坚持品质第一是本店的服务宗旨。

sentences.english: The fundamental purpose of my plan is to encourage further development.
sentences.chinese: 我的计划的根本宗旨是鼓励进一步的发展。

definition: to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
to work for/to devote one's efforts to
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to have as its purpose/to be intended to/to aim to (do sth)
